name: The Mystery of the Empty Enclosure
name_original: The Mystery of the Empty Enclosure
description:
Can you solve the mystery of the missing sea lion, and return him to his enclosure before show time? 

If you don't, your boss might just slip into a murderous rage...

Made for Mini Jam 98, with the theme of "Empty"...

https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-98-empty

An attempt at a roguelike visual novel, made in Ren'Py.
